Chess - Class in <Unnamed>
CSC335 Due: 2021-12-08 Team 12 Team Project: Chess Jeff Wiederkehr, Chris Herrera, Dylan Snavely, Jason Earl This program enables user's to play a standard game of chess, both locally and networked.

This class will enable the users to click on a GUI to play the game.

ChessGUIView.compoundKey - Record Class in view
This record is used to make a unique key to use in our node map for each i,j index in the 2d grid pane.
ChessModel - Class in model
This class represents the model in the MVC format of the program.
ChessModel() - Constructor for class model.ChessModel
The constructor will initialize a grid and a map of game pieces to track the game progress.
ChessModel.Move - Record Class in model
A way to store info about a piece and its coordinates.
